PackageOracle.name: DA_CAMPAIGN
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_CAMPAIGN
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.44.199674000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,campaign_desc IN VARCHAR2
,campaign_end_dt IN DATE
,campaign_est_base_cust_cnt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_contact_cnt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_cost_amt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_customer_cnt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_position_cnt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_revenue_gain_amt IN NUMBER
,campaign_level_number IN VARCHAR2
,campaign_number IN VARCHAR2
,campaign_owner_orig_party_id IN NUMBER
,campaign_start_dt IN DATE
,campaign_strategy_cd IN VARCHAR2
,campaign_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,currency_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,campaign_desc IN VARCHAR2
,campaign_end_dt IN DATE
,campaign_est_base_cust_cnt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_contact_cnt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_cost_amt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_customer_cnt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_position_cnt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_revenue_gain_amt IN NUMBER
,campaign_level_number IN VARCHAR2
,campaign_number IN VARCHAR2
,campaign_owner_orig_party_id IN NUMBER
,campaign_start_dt IN DATE
,campaign_strategy_cd IN VARCHAR2
,campaign_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,currency_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,campaign_id IN NUMBER
,campaign_desc IN VARCHAR2
,campaign_end_dt IN DATE
,campaign_est_base_cust_cnt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_contact_cnt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_cost_amt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_customer_cnt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_position_cnt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_revenue_gain_amt IN NUMBER
,campaign_level_number IN VARCHAR2
,campaign_number IN VARCHAR2
,campaign_owner_orig_party_id IN NUMBER
,campaign_start_dt IN DATE
,campaign_strategy_cd IN VARCHAR2
,campaign_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,currency_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,campaign_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_campaign;

body.name: DA_CAMPAIGN
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_CAMPAIGN
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.44.213219000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,campaign_desc IN VARCHAR2
,campaign_end_dt IN DATE
,campaign_est_base_cust_cnt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_contact_cnt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_cost_amt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_customer_cnt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_position_cnt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_revenue_gain_amt IN NUMBER
,campaign_level_number IN VARCHAR2
,campaign_number IN VARCHAR2
,campaign_owner_orig_party_id IN NUMBER
,campaign_start_dt IN DATE
,campaign_strategy_cd IN VARCHAR2
,campaign_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,currency_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_campaign.add(fx), parms=' || campaign_desc || '|' || campaign_end_dt || '|' || campaign_est_base_cust_cnt || '|' || campaign_est_contact_cnt || '|' || campaign_est_cost_amt || '|' || campaign_est_customer_cnt || '|' || campaign_est_position_cnt || '|' || campaign_est_revenue_gain_amt || '|' || campaign_level_number || '|' || campaign_number || '|' || campaign_owner_orig_party_id || '|' || campaign_start_dt || '|' || campaign_strategy_cd || '|' || campaign_type_cd || '|' || currency_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_campaign a
(
a.campaign_id
,a.campaign_desc
,a.campaign_end_dt
,a.campaign_est_base_cust_cnt
,a.campaign_est_contact_cnt
,a.campaign_est_cost_amt
,a.campaign_est_customer_cnt
,a.campaign_est_position_cnt
,a.campaign_est_revenue_gain_amt
,a.campaign_level_number
,a.campaign_number
,a.campaign_owner_orig_party_id
,a.campaign_start_dt
,a.campaign_strategy_cd
,a.campaign_type_cd
,a.currency_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_campaign_id.NEXTVAL
,add.campaign_desc
,add.campaign_end_dt
,add.campaign_est_base_cust_cnt
,add.campaign_est_contact_cnt
,add.campaign_est_cost_amt
,add.campaign_est_customer_cnt
,add.campaign_est_position_cnt
,add.campaign_est_revenue_gain_amt
,add.campaign_level_number
,add.campaign_number
,add.campaign_owner_orig_party_id
,add.campaign_start_dt
,add.campaign_strategy_cd
,add.campaign_type_cd
,add.currency_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.campaign_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_campaign.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,campaign_desc IN VARCHAR2
,campaign_end_dt IN DATE
,campaign_est_base_cust_cnt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_contact_cnt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_cost_amt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_customer_cnt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_position_cnt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_revenue_gain_amt IN NUMBER
,campaign_level_number IN VARCHAR2
,campaign_number IN VARCHAR2
,campaign_owner_orig_party_id IN NUMBER
,campaign_start_dt IN DATE
,campaign_strategy_cd IN VARCHAR2
,campaign_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,currency_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_campaign.add, parms=' || campaign_desc || '|' || campaign_end_dt || '|' || campaign_est_base_cust_cnt || '|' || campaign_est_contact_cnt || '|' || campaign_est_cost_amt || '|' || campaign_est_customer_cnt || '|' || campaign_est_position_cnt || '|' || campaign_est_revenue_gain_amt || '|' || campaign_level_number || '|' || campaign_number || '|' || campaign_owner_orig_party_id || '|' || campaign_start_dt || '|' || campaign_strategy_cd || '|' || campaign_type_cd || '|' || currency_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_campaign a
(
a.campaign_id
,a.campaign_desc
,a.campaign_end_dt
,a.campaign_est_base_cust_cnt
,a.campaign_est_contact_cnt
,a.campaign_est_cost_amt
,a.campaign_est_customer_cnt
,a.campaign_est_position_cnt
,a.campaign_est_revenue_gain_amt
,a.campaign_level_number
,a.campaign_number
,a.campaign_owner_orig_party_id
,a.campaign_start_dt
,a.campaign_strategy_cd
,a.campaign_type_cd
,a.currency_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_campaign_id.NEXTVAL
,add.campaign_desc
,add.campaign_end_dt
,add.campaign_est_base_cust_cnt
,add.campaign_est_contact_cnt
,add.campaign_est_cost_amt
,add.campaign_est_customer_cnt
,add.campaign_est_position_cnt
,add.campaign_est_revenue_gain_amt
,add.campaign_level_number
,add.campaign_number
,add.campaign_owner_orig_party_id
,add.campaign_start_dt
,add.campaign_strategy_cd
,add.campaign_type_cd
,add.currency_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_campaign.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,campaign_id IN NUMBER
,campaign_desc IN VARCHAR2
,campaign_end_dt IN DATE
,campaign_est_base_cust_cnt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_contact_cnt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_cost_amt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_customer_cnt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_position_cnt IN NUMBER
,campaign_est_revenue_gain_amt IN NUMBER
,campaign_level_number IN VARCHAR2
,campaign_number IN VARCHAR2
,campaign_owner_orig_party_id IN NUMBER
,campaign_start_dt IN DATE
,campaign_strategy_cd IN VARCHAR2
,campaign_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,currency_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_campaign.add, parms=' || campaign_id || '|' || campaign_desc || '|' || campaign_end_dt || '|' || campaign_est_base_cust_cnt || '|' || campaign_est_contact_cnt || '|' || campaign_est_cost_amt || '|' || campaign_est_customer_cnt || '|' || campaign_est_position_cnt || '|' || campaign_est_revenue_gain_amt || '|' || campaign_level_number || '|' || campaign_number || '|' || campaign_owner_orig_party_id || '|' || campaign_start_dt || '|' || campaign_strategy_cd || '|' || campaign_type_cd || '|' || currency_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_campaign a
(
a.campaign_id
,a.campaign_desc
,a.campaign_end_dt
,a.campaign_est_base_cust_cnt
,a.campaign_est_contact_cnt
,a.campaign_est_cost_amt
,a.campaign_est_customer_cnt
,a.campaign_est_position_cnt
,a.campaign_est_revenue_gain_amt
,a.campaign_level_number
,a.campaign_number
,a.campaign_owner_orig_party_id
,a.campaign_start_dt
,a.campaign_strategy_cd
,a.campaign_type_cd
,a.currency_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.campaign_id
,add.campaign_desc
,add.campaign_end_dt
,add.campaign_est_base_cust_cnt
,add.campaign_est_contact_cnt
,add.campaign_est_cost_amt
,add.campaign_est_customer_cnt
,add.campaign_est_position_cnt
,add.campaign_est_revenue_gain_amt
,add.campaign_level_number
,add.campaign_number
,add.campaign_owner_orig_party_id
,add.campaign_start_dt
,add.campaign_strategy_cd
,add.campaign_type_cd
,add.currency_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_campaign.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,campaign_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_campaign.del, parms=' || campaign_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_campaign a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.campaign_id = del.campaign_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_campaign.del');

END del;

END da_campaign;
